thread.title_full: Today Show's Hoda Kotb Adopts Baby Girl | 103.5 KTU

title: Today Show's Hoda Kotb Adopts Baby Girl | 103.5 KTU
text:
Today Show's Hoda Kotb Adopts Baby Girl posted by Allie Gold - A post shared by TODAY (@todayshow) on Feb 21, 2017 at 5:17am PST 
Hoda Kotb has announced she is a mom! 
The Today Show co-anchor announced on Tuesday that she adopted a baby girl named Haley Joy Kotb . While phoning into the show she said, "She's a Valentine's baby. She is the love of my life." Hoda's co-host Kathie Lee Gifford kept it all a secret the whole time! She said "I have the biggest mouth in the world and I've said zilch." 
Congratulations to your growing family Hoda! 
Photo: Getty
